Package pl.com.muca.server.usercontroller

Class PollController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.com.muca.server.usercontroller.PollController
  • @RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/pollApp")
public class PollController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST API controller for polls' related operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getPolls

        @GetMapping("/listPolls")
public java.util.List<Poll> getPolls​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                     java.lang.String token)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Lists all polls available in the system.
        Parameters:
        token - User session token
        Returns:
        List of Poll objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not read polls from database

      • getMyPolls

        @GetMapping("/listMyPolls")
public java.util.List<Poll> getMyPolls​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                       java.lang.String token)
        Lists all polls created by the user. User is determined base on the session token.
        Parameters:
        token - User session token
        Returns:
        List of Poll objects

      • getPollDetails

        @GetMapping("/getPollDetails/{pollId}")
public Poll getPollDetails​(@PathVariable
                           java.lang.Integer pollId,
                           @RequestHeader("Authorization")
                           java.lang.String token)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Provides detailed information about the poll.
        Parameters:
        pollId - Id of requested poll
        token - User session token
        Returns:
        detailed poll info
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not read poll details from database

      • createPoll

        @PostMapping("/createPoll")
public void createPoll​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                       java.lang.String token,
                       @RequestBody
                       Poll poll)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Accepts Poll object and inserts its data to the database.
        Parameters:
        token - User session token
        poll - poll to create
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if could not insert poll data to the database

      • createPoll

        @PostMapping("/saveUserAnswers")
public int createPoll​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                      java.lang.String token,
                      @RequestBody
                      UserAnswer[] answers)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Accepts user answers in the form of Array of UserAnswer objects and inserts its data to the database.
        Parameters:
        token - User session token
        answers - Array of UserAnswer objects
        Returns:
        Validation hash code for user answers.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if could not insert data to the database

      • verifyPollAnswers

        @PostMapping("/verifyPollAnswers")
public boolean verifyPollAnswers​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                 java.lang.String token,
                                 @RequestBody
                                 UserWhoAnsweredPoll userWhoAnsweredPoll)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Validates user answers hash code for a given poll. Checks if validation hash code generated base on user data and user answers matches the validation code provided in params.
        Parameters:
        token - User session token
        userWhoAnsweredPoll - Object of UserWhoAnsweredPoll
        Returns:
        determines whether user answers hash code passed matches answers in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if have problems with reading data from database

      • getUsersAnsweredPoll

        @PostMapping("/getUsersWhoAnsweredToPoll")
public java.util.List<User> getUsersAnsweredPoll​(@RequestBody
                                                 int pollId)
        Returns all users who already answered to a poll.
        Parameters:
        pollId - ID of the poll
        Returns:
        List of User objects
